Resource.item:
From this page you can view the questionnaires you can partecipate in.
To enter a questionnaire you should only click on its name

The page is made up of sections that you can view by clicking on the section name:

{0}
all the questionnaires associated to the community are listed

{1}
all the public questionnaires in the system are listed

{3}
all the questionnaires, the user has been invited to, are listed

{2}
all the questionnaires, compiled by the user, are listed

The following symbols are associated to every questionnaire (first column of the list):
{4} open questionnaire, compilation allowed
{5} blocked questionnaire, compilation not allowed

Every questionnaire is displayed in a language, the creator set.
Questionnaires can be created in different languages; a list of flag icons is displayed, an icon for each available language.
To select a language just click the flag of the corresponding country:

{6}
